subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: With the first pick in baseball’s first-year player draft, the Astros took Mark Appel, who was expected by many to be taken by Houston in 2012 but was passed over.
snippet: With the first pick in baseball’s first-year player draft, the Astros took Mark Appel, who was expected by many to be taken by Houston in 2012 but was passed over.
